column4: cant he just update his sources.lst and have it get update-manager
Not with the way update-manager(-core) works apparently.  Tries to use archive.ubuntu.com
k, can he use http://packages.ubuntu.com/ and just install the .deb?
He doesn't need to install debs, he can use old-releases.ubuntu.com for that.  But he'd have to manually upgrade (which works just as well)
